main event: A unidentified object was spotted and disappeared from a radar screen during an observation in East Orange, New Jersey on July 15, 1963.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a satellite and was initially observed in the western sky,The observer believed the object was a satellite due to its characteristics,The sighting lasted for 10 minutes,The object traveled south-southwest before disappearing,The observer reported a total of one object involved in the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified object, believed to be a satellite
witness description: The main witness was driving at the time of the sighting and noticed the object following alongside the car before it accelerated out of view.
